summary: The Medical Research for Our Troops Act (H.R. 3906) amends the Full-Year Continuing Appropriations and Extensions Act, 2025. It restores funds for Defense Health Agency research, development, test, and evaluation, including Congressionally Directed Medical Research Programs. The bill specifies how these funds should be allocated, referencing the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2024, to ensure program continuity and adherence to identified research priorities. The bill aims to increase funding for medical research related to national defense.
